mapper.select:
SELECT T1.PD_CD /* 상품코드 */ , T1.PD_NM /* 상품약어명 */ , T1.SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP코드 */ , T1.SVPD_ITEM_GR /* 상품군 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1110) AS CNT_1110 /* 신규설치 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1111) AS CNT_1111 /* 설치철거 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1121) AS CNT_1121 /* 자사회수 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1122) AS CNT_1122 /* 자사미회수 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1123) AS CNT_1123 /* 타사회수 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1124) AS CNT_1124 /* 타사미회수 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1125) AS CNT_1125 /* 자사분리 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1310) + SUM(T1.CNT_1320) AS CNT_1390 /* 필터판매 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1110) + SUM(T1.CNT_1111) + SUM(T1.CNT_1121) + SUM(T1.CNT_1122) + SUM(T1.CNT_1123) + SUM(T1.CNT_1124) + SUM(T1.CNT_1125) AS CNT_1100 /* 설치소계 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2110) AS CNT_2110 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2111) AS CNT_2111 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2120) AS CNT_2120 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2131) AS CNT_2131 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2132) AS CNT_2132 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2133) AS CNT_2133 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2134) AS CNT_2134 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2135) AS CNT_2135 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2136) AS CNT_2136 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2137) AS CNT_2137 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2138) AS CNT_2138 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2139) AS CNT_2139 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2210) AS CNT_2210 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2220) AS CNT_2220 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2230) AS CNT_2230 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2141) AS CNT_2141 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2142) AS CNT_2142 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2143) AS CNT_2143 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2144) AS CNT_2144 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2149) AS CNT_2149 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2150) AS CNT_2150 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2150) AS CNT_2151 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2153) AS CNT_2153 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2154) AS CNT_2154 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2158) AS CNT_2158 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2159) AS CNT_2159 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2160) AS CNT_2160 /* BS */ , SUM(T1.CNT_2110) + SUM(T1.CNT_2111) + SUM(T1.CNT_2120) + SUM(T1.CNT_2131) + SUM(T1.CNT_2132) + SUM(T1.CNT_2133) + SUM(T1.CNT_2134) + SUM(T1.CNT_2135) + SUM(T1.CNT_2136) + SUM(T1.CNT_2137) + SUM(T1.CNT_2138) + SUM(T1.CNT_2139) + SUM(T1.CNT_2141) + SUM(T1.CNT_2142) + SUM(T1.CNT_2143) + SUM(T1.CNT_2144) + SUM(T1.CNT_2149) + SUM(T1.CNT_2150) + SUM(T1.CNT_2151) + SUM(T1.CNT_2153) + SUM(T1.CNT_2154) + SUM(T1.CNT_2158) + SUM(T1.CNT_2159) + SUM(T1.CNT_2160) + SUM(T1.CNT_2210) + SUM(T1.CNT_2220) + SUM(T1.CNT_2230) AS CNT_2100 /* B/S 소계 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3420) + SUM(T1.CNT_3420_R) AS CNT_3420 /* 매출취소 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3420_R) AS CNT_3420_R /* 매출취소 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3410) + SUM(T1.CNT_3410_R) AS CNT_3410 /* 상품취소 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3410_R) AS CNT_3410_R /* 상품취소 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3310) AS CNT_3310 /* 이전분리 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3320) AS CNT_3320 /* 이전재설치 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3210) AS CNT_3210 /* 제품원인 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3230) AS CNT_3230 /* 고객원인 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3110) AS CNT_3110 /* 제품A/S */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3112) AS CNT_3112 /* 특별A/S */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3121) AS CNT_3121 /* 필터B/S */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3122) AS CNT_3122 /* 필터방문판매 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3130) AS CNT_3130 /* 환경점검 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3440) AS CNT_3440 /* 회사설치 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3460) AS CNT_3460 /* 택배반품 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3200) + SUM(T1.CNT_3220) + SUM(T1.CNT_3330) + SUM(T1.CNT_3430) + SUM(T1.CNT_3100) AS CNT_3199 /* A/S기타 */ , SUM(T1.CNT_3420) + SUM(T1.CNT_3410) + SUM(T1.CNT_3420_R) + SUM(T1.CNT_3410_R) + SUM(T1.CNT_3310) + SUM(T1.CNT_3320) + SUM(T1.CNT_3210) + SUM(T1.CNT_3230) + SUM(T1.CNT_3110) + SUM(T1.CNT_3112) + SUM(T1.CNT_3121) + SUM(T1.CNT_3122) + SUM(T1.CNT_3130) + SUM(T1.CNT_3440) + SUM(T1.CNT_3200) + SUM(T1.CNT_3220) + SUM(T1.CNT_3330) + SUM(T1.CNT_3430) + SUM(T1.CNT_3100) + SUM(T1.CNT_3460) AS CNT_3100 /* A/S */ , SUM(T1.CNT_1310) + SUM(T1.CNT_1320) + SUM(T1.CNT_2110) + SUM(T1.CNT_2111) + SUM(T1.CNT_2120) + SUM(T1.CNT_2131) + SUM(T1.CNT_2132) + SUM(T1.CNT_2133) + SUM(T1.CNT_2134) + SUM(T1.CNT_2135) + SUM(T1.CNT_2136) + SUM(T1.CNT_2137) + SUM(T1.CNT_2138) + SUM(T1.CNT_2139) + SUM(T1.CNT_2141) + SUM(T1.CNT_2142) + SUM(T1.CNT_2143) + SUM(T1.CNT_2144) + SUM(T1.CNT_2149) + SUM(T1.CNT_2150) + SUM(T1.CNT_2151) + SUM(T1.CNT_2153) + SUM(T1.CNT_2154) + SUM(T1.CNT_2158) + SUM(T1.CNT_2159) + SUM(T1.CNT_2160) + SUM(T1.CNT_2210) + SUM(T1.CNT_2220) + SUM(T1.CNT_2230) + SUM(T1.CNT_1110) + SUM(T1.CNT_1111) + SUM(T1.CNT_1121) + SUM(T1.CNT_1122) + SUM(T1.CNT_1123) + SUM(T1.CNT_1124) + SUM(T1.CNT_1125) + SUM(T1.CNT_3420) + SUM(T1.CNT_3410) + SUM(T1.CNT_3420_R) + SUM(T1.CNT_3410_R) + SUM(T1.CNT_3310) + SUM(T1.CNT_3320) + SUM(T1.CNT_3210) + SUM(T1.CNT_3230) + SUM(T1.CNT_3110) + SUM(T1.CNT_3112) + SUM(T1.CNT_3121) + SUM(T1.CNT_3122) + SUM(T1.CNT_3130) + SUM(T1.CNT_3440) + SUM(T1.CNT_3200) + SUM(T1.CNT_3220) + SUM(T1.CNT_3330) + SUM(T1.CNT_3430) + SUM(T1.CNT_3100) + SUM(T1.CNT_3460) AS CNTT FROM (SELECT V1.PD_CD , V1.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_NM , V1.SAP_MAT_CD , V1.SVPD_ITEM_GR , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1110' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1110 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1111' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1111 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1121' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1121 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1122' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1122 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1123' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1123 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1124' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1124 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1125' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1125 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1310' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1310 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '1320' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_1320 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2110' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2110 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2111' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2111 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2120' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2120 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2131' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2131 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2132' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2132 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2133' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2133 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2134' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2134 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2135' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2135 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2136' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2136 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2137' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2137 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2138' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2138 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2139' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2139 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2141' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2141 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2142' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2142 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2143' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2143 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2144' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2144 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2149' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2149 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2150' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2150 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2151' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2151 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2153' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2153 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2154' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2154 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2158' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2158 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2159' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2159 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2160' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2160 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2210' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2210 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2220' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2220 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2230' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_2230 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3100' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3100 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3110' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3110 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3112' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3112 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3121' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3121 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3122' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3122 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3130' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3130 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3200' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3200 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3210' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3210 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3220' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3220 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3230' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3230 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3310' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3310 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3320' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3320 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3330' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3330 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3410' AND V1.REFURBISH_YN = '2' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3410 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3410' AND V1.REFURBISH_YN = '1' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3410_R , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3420' AND V1.REFURBISH_YN = '2' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3420 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3420' AND V1.REFURBISH_YN = '1' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3420_R , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3430' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3430 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3440' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3440 , COUNT(CASE WHEN V1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3460' THEN 1 END) AS CNT_3460 , COUNT(1) CNTT FROM (SELECT A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /* 고객서비스배정번호 */ , E1.PDCT_PD_CD AS PD_CD /* 상품코드 */ , P1.PD_ABBR_NM /* 상품약어명 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(P1.SAP_MAT_CD)) AS SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP코드 */ , A1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD /* 서비스업무세분류코드 */ , P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS SVPD_ITEM_GR /* 상품군 */ , (CASE WHEN TO_DATE(A2.WK_EXCN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(E1.IST_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') <= 90 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END) AS REFURBISH_YN /* 리퍼여부 */ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ A1 /* 고객서비스AS설치대상내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ A2 /* 고객서비스AS설치배정내역 */ ON A2.CST_SV_ASN_NO = A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND A2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ M1 /* 월파트너내역 */ ON M1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(A2.WK_EXCN_DT, 1, 6) AND M1.OG_TP_CD = A2.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND M1.PRTNR_NO = A2.WK_PRTNR_NO AND M1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND M1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ E1 /* 고객서비스수행내역 */ ON E1.CNTR_NO = A1.CNTR_NO AND E1.CNTR_SN = A1.CNTR_SN AND E1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ W1 /* 고객서비스작업결과내역 */ ON W1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND W1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 /* 상품기본 */ ON P1.PD_CD = E1.PDCT_PD_CD AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P2 ON P2.PD_CD = P1.PD_CD AND P2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' AND P2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' /* 상품 */
AND M1.OG_ID = #{ogId} /* 서비스센터 */
AND A2.WK_EXCN_DT BETWEEN #{wkExcnDtFrom} AND #{wkExcnDtTo} /* 처리일자 */
AND W1.REFRI_DV_CD = #{refriDvCd} /* 유무상구분코드 */
AND P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = #{pdGrpCd} /* 상품군 */
UNION ALL SELECT O2.CST_SV_ASN_NO /* 고객서비스배정번호 */ , E2.PDCT_PD_CD AS PD_CD /* 상품코드 */ , P1.PD_ABBR_NM /* 상품약어명 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(P1.SAP_MAT_CD)) AS SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP코드 */ , O2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD /* 서비스업무세분류코드 */ , P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS SVPD_ITEM_GR /* 상품군 */ , '2' AS REFURBISH_YN /* 리퍼여부 */ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ O1 /* 고객서비스BS대상내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ O2 /* 고객서비스BS배정내역 */ ON O2.CST_SV_ASN_NO = O1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND O2.ASN_OJ_YM = O1.ASN_OJ_YM AND O2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ M1 ON M1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(O2.CNFM_PSIC_ASN_DT, 1, 6) AND M1.OG_TP_CD = O2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND M1.PRTNR_NO = O2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AND M1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND M1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ E2 /* 고객서비스수행내역 */ ON E2.CNTR_NO = O2.CNTR_NO AND E2.CNTR_SN = O2.CNTR_SN AND E2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ W1 /* 고객서비스작업결과내역 */ ON W1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = O2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND W1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 /* 상품기본 */ ON P1.PD_CD = E2.PDCT_PD_CD AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P2 ON P2.PD_CD = P1.PD_CD AND P2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND O2.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' AND O2.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD = '2' /* 엔지니어 */ AND E2.BFSVC_SPP_STP_RSON_CD = '00' AND O1.VST_DV_CD = '10' /* 방문구분코드 ("10" 방문) */ AND P2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' /* 상품 */
AND M1.OG_ID = #{ogId} /* 서비스센터 */
AND O2.WK_EXCN_DT BETWEEN #{wkExcnDtFrom} AND #{wkExcnDtTo} /* 처리일자 */
AND W1.REFRI_DV_CD = #{refriDvCd} /* 유무상구분코드 */
AND P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = #{pdGrpCd} /* 상품군 */
) V1 GROUP BY V1.PD_CD, V1.PD_ABBR_NM, V1.SAP_MAT_CD, V1.SVPD_ITEM_GR ) T1 GROUP BY T1.PD_CD, T1.PD_NM, T1.SAP_MAT_CD, T1.SVPD_ITEM_GR ORDER BY T1.PD_CD
